column5: Going to Lynn Lake in Northern Manitoba in early June - Is there still ice?MN

As of today we still have around 22 inches of ice.It is melting from shore slowly,hopfully it will be gone in just over a week.Guys have still been riding snow machines across the ice and still ice fishing.I live in the Thompson area.i'll keep posting ice conditions this way.
Hey MN what lakes do you fish in the Lynn lake area, and how long have you been going up that way? I'm still exploring ,still learning the area. any info would be appreciated. thanks
HoosierCanadien,This will be my 1st year. My dad and I are going with a guy that has been going up for 10 years. We will learn alot - I will keep you posted.MN
